DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect culturally sensitive diabetes self-management program glucose control metabolic parameter low income Mexican-Americans type 2 diabetes use Project Dulce model utilize low cost , peer-educator format .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Peer Led Education-Project Dulce
DOC.detailed_description: To recruit 207 Mexican-Americans patient federally-funded community health center San Diego County Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) > 8 % randomize Project Dulce peer intervention continuation standard diabetes care . The primary outcome percent change HbA1c level 10 month follow randomization .
DOC.criteria: Mexican American , men woman , 2175 year old , underinsured patient federally qualify community health center San Diego County type 2 diabetes HbA1c > = 8 % . Individuals physical mental health condition would preclude fulfilling requirement study ineligible participate , HbA1c < 8 , pregnant gestational diabetes
